title: Is 'Castcraft-software' a real type foundry?
content:
Does anybody have information about this foundry:  
 [http://www.castcraft-software.com/cgi-bin/castcraft/castcraft.home?365,189](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403192807/http:/www.castcraft-software.com/cgi-bin/castcraft/castcraft.home?365,189)

Thanks in advance.
author: RamiroE

comments.content: i believe so. apparently they have digital versions of some hard-to-find titles. perhaps they’re hard to find because their website is so poor and hasn’t been updated in what looks like a decade. I wish they would just put their library on myfonts and make it more accessible.

Castcraft was at one time a distributor and caster of metal type. Both Monotype and foundry. Though tey had licenses to recast with European foundries, such as Stempel and Bauer, they were not that well regarded.

At some point they digitized an awful lot of these. As Paul says some of them are quite hard to find elsewhere. The problem is that these are not often the best renditions and are technically quite poor.

Gerald
